name: Lost (itch) (J4cko.16)
description:
Can you escape the deserted island before you dehydrate?

When you download the game you are prompted to donate, though this game is free we at Tiny Pebble Studios would gratefully accept any donations so we can fund more awesome and expensive game projects! 

This game was made by J4cko.16 from tiny pebble studios! We hope you enjoy it!

Play without downloading on Newgrounds: https://j4cko16.itch.io/lost
